root.limiter: SCGR SC DEV DEV1 NUMDEV DCP STATE REASON /any/ \n{2,}

REASON.b6: Not activated in Regional Processor (RP) unit
REASON.b9: SC is faulty, used for maintenance purposes
REASON.b10: Transceiver Group (TG) not connected to Super Channel Group (SCGR)
REASON.b17-b18: Switching Network Terminal (SNT) manually, auto, or control blocked
REASON.b20: Failure on User Side Extension Module (EM) is blocked Failure at communication with RP 10Gb network fault
REASON.b23: Transport Protocol Fault 10Gb network fault VLAN type fault Payload or transport protocol mismatch, or both
REASON.b29: SC is faulty, used for maintenance purposes
